generated_body: If you click on the article titled "What Happens When Your Cruise Has to Rescue Another Ship," you might expect a detailed exploration of the procedures and protocols involved when a cruise liner assists another vessel in distress. The article is likely to cover the logistical challenges of coordinating a rescue operation at sea, the responsibilities of the crew, and the safety measures taken to protect both passengers and crew members during such incidents. Additionally, it may include insights into past rescue operations, illustrating how cruise ships have responded to emergencies, and the impact these situations have on travelers’ experiences.
